page.title: 08YOXALL RECREATION (cont)
page.content: The Golden Cup public house has a men's darts team and the Forrester's Arms has a mixed darts team. The Crown participates in the usual pub games, darts, dominoes etc.but on a non- competitive basis. The Golden Cup took part last year and succeeded in winning "Tennant's Super Quiz", promoted by Tennant's Brewery, and won a Caithness Glass trophy for defeating 32 other public houses. Yoxall boasts 3 football teams.4 badminton clubs are held in the village hall.The cricket club fields 2 team. The gardening club meets monthly and snooker is played in the British Legion hall for members and friends. The Women's Institute currently has 42 members. Activities such as Ladies Keep Fit and Sequence dancing are run by the Evening Institute.
